import React from'react';import{useSoundContext}from'./SoundContext';import SoundOn from'../assets/SoundOn.png';import SoundOff from'../assets/SoundOff.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SoundToggleButton=()=>{const{isSoundOn,toggleSound}=useSoundContext();/* this is the simpler way to access state and function
  from SoundContext.Provider*/const buttonStyle={fontFamily:"Arial, sans serif",border:"solid 4px #fff",boxShadow:"0 0 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)",borderRadius:"15px",transform:"scale(0.15)",padding:"15px",cursor:"pointer",transition:"background-color 0.3s",textDecoration:"none",color:"#ffff",backgroundColor:"#233349"};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleSound,style:buttonStyle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:isSoundOn?SoundOff:SoundOn})});};export default SoundToggleButton;
